summary:
Working as an Implementation Manager at Adyen providing,designing and implementing product solutions for global customers as part of the Implementation management team. I posses 9+ years of experience working in the computer
software industry, with 6+ years of development experience working as a Software Engineer in an agile environment and 3+ years experience as a Solutions Engineer. 

Having previously worked as an Associate Technical Lead in the WSO2 Public Cloud team, I have led many projects and been a mentor/coach to my junior colleagues. In addition to pre sales activities, solutions designing and development I am having an exposure to puppet, visualization platforms such as docker and have used cluster management technologies such as Kubernetes. I have also great exposure in the API Management, Integration and Identity protocols and management. Above all, I love challenging myself and learning new things!
